

and x3, x1, x2
10001010000_00010_000000_00001_00011

add x4, x1, x2
10001011000_00010_000000_00001_00100

orr x5, x1, x2
10101010000_00010_000000_00001_00101

sub x6, x1, x2
11001011000_00010_000000_00001_00110

stur x1, [x2, 0x3]
11111000000_00000000011_00010_00001

ldur x7, [x2, 0x3]
11111000010_00000000011_00010_00111

b 0xA
00010100000_0000000000000000001010

add x8, x1, x2
10001011000_00010_000000_00001_01000

cbz x1, 0x5
10110100000_000000000000111_00001

cbz x31, 0x5
10110100000_000000000000111_11111


x0 10
x1 8
x7 111111





movk x9, 0x4                     x7=111111
11110010100_000000000000100_00111
√ª”√µΩ
